title: # 446 - Aaron “P-Nut” Wills & ME
description:
Today I sit down with 311 Bassist Aaron “P-Nut” Wills. We talk about Weed, The RV Fire, writing “Beautiful Disaster”, the music business, how 311 discovered their sound, and much more! 

 

My new show “Go Big Show” premieres this week Jan 7th 9pm PST on TBS! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Fre. Get 20% off at http://www.frepouch.com when you use the promo code “FreBert”.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com   

 

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon. Get 15% off your order at https://www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Fight Camp. Get free shipping at http://www.joinfightcamp.com/bert
